title: Grand Theft Auto V / GTA 5

description.about: Grand Theft Auto V (GTA 5), developed by Rockstar Games, is an acclaimed open-world action-adventure game released on April 14, 2015. Set in the expansive environments of Los Santos and Blaine County, the game offers players the freedom to explore a richly detailed world, engaging in a variety of missions and activities. The PC version enhances this experience with support for resolutions up to 4K and the capability to run at 60 frames per second, providing a more immersive and visually stunning experience.

tags: Action, Shooter, Driving, Open world, First-person, Third-person, 3D

minimum_req.os: Windows 10 64 Bit, Windows 8.1 64 Bit, Windows 8 64 Bit, Windows 7 64 Bit Service Pack 1, Windows Vista 64 Bit Service Pack 2* (*NVIDIA video card recommended if running Vista OS)
minimum_req.processor: Intel Core 2 Quad CPU Q6600 @ 2.40GHz (4 CPUs) / AMD Phenom 9850 Quad-Core Processor (4 CPUs) @ 2.5GHz

recommended_req.processor: Intel Core i5 3470 @ 3.2GHz (4 CPUs) / AMD X8 FX-8350 @ 4GHz (8 CPUs)

description.about: Arthur Morgan and the Van der Linde gang are outlaws on the run. With federal agents and the best bounty hunters in the nation massing on their heels, the gang must rob, steal and fight their way across the rugged heartland of America in order to survive. As deepening internal divisions threaten to tear the gang apart, Arthur must make a choice between his own ideals and loyalty to the gang who raised him.

description.about: The game’s story follows Kratos and Atreus as they navigate the nine realms of Norse mythology to prevent the apocalyptic event known as Ragnarök. This sequel builds upon the narrative of the previous game, God of War (2018), and introduces new realms, characters, and challenges. The gameplay combines combat, exploration, and puzzle-solving, with players using Kratos’s signature weapons, the Leviathan Axe and the Blades of Chaos, to battle enemies.

description.about: Experience the story of Basim, a cunning street thief seeking answers and justice as he navigates the bustling streets of ninth-century Baghdad. Through a mysterious, ancient organization known as the Hidden Ones, he will become a deadly Master Assassin and change his fate in ways he never could have imagined.

title: The Last of Us: Part I

image.alt: The Last of Us: Part I

description.about: In a ravaged civilization, where infected and hardened survivors run rampant, Joel, a weary protagonist, is hired to smuggle 14-year-old Ellie out of a military quarantine zone. However, what starts as a small job soon transforms into a brutal cross-country journey. Includes the complete The Last of Us single-player story and celebrated prequel chapter, Left Behind, which explores the events that changed the lives of Ellie and her best friend Riley forever. The Last of Us Part I PC release brings with it plenty of PC features to bring Joel and Ellie’s tense and unforgettable journey to life. This version of The Last of Us Part I is optimized for PC with PC-centric quality-of-life enhancements. Part I will feature AMD FSR 2.2 support*, Nvidia DLSS Super Resolution support*, VSync and frame rate cap options, and a host of features designed specifically for PC, including adjustable Texture Quality, Shadows, Reflections, Ambient Occlusion, and more.

title: Marvel’s Spider-Man Remastered

description.about: The game’s story follows Spider-Man as he faces off against a new threat to the city. The story is full of twists and turns, with a complex plot that explores the character’s personal life and relationships. The main story follows Spider-Man as he battles against the Inner Demons, a group of supervillains who are terrorizing the city. The game also features a variety of side quests, including quests from other Marvel characters, such as Miles Morales and Mary Jane Watson. The game explores Spider-Man’s personal life, including his relationships with his friends and family, and his struggles to balance his superhero life with his personal life. The game features a wide range of characters from the Marvel universe, including Spider-Man, Miles Morales, Mary Jane Watson, Aunt May, Norman Osborn, and the Inner Demons.

publisher: Insomniac Games, Nixxes Software, PlayStation PC LLC

description.about: Cyberpunk 2077 is an open-world, action-adventure RPG set in the megalopolis of Night City, where you play as a cyberpunk mercenary wrapped up in a do-or-die fight for survival. Improved and featuring all-new free additional content, customize your character and playstyle as you take on jobs, build a reputation, and unlock upgrades. The relationships you forge and the choices you make will shape the story and the world around you. Legends are made here. What will yours be?

title: Ghost of Tsushima DIRECTOR'S CUT

description.about: In the late 13th century, the Mongol empire has laid waste to entire nations along their campaign to conquer the East. Tsushima Island is all that stands between mainland Japan and a massive Mongol invasion fleet led by the ruthless and cunning general, Khotun Khan. As the island burns in the wake of the first wave of the Mongol assault, courageous samurai warrior Jin Sakai stands resolute. As one of the last surviving members of his clan, Jin is resolved to do whatever it takes, at any cost, to protect his people and reclaim his home. He must set aside the traditions that have shaped him as a warrior to forge a new path, the path of the Ghost, and wage an unconventional war for the freedom of Tsushima.

publisher: Sucker Punch Productions, Nixxes Software, Sony Interactive

description.about: The game features hundreds of cars for players to collect, including iconic models from Ferrari, Lamborghini, and Porsche, as well as more modern and exotic cars. Each car has its own unique handling and performance characteristics, allowing players to choose the car that best suits their driving style. The game also features a variety of racing modes, including circuit racing, sprint racing, and off-road racing, as well as more unique modes such as the “Forza Vista” mode, which allows players to explore the game’s world and take in the sights and sounds of the environment. The game’s multiplayer mode allows players to compete with each other in online races, as well as cooperate with each other to complete challenges and achieve goals.

title: ELDEN RING: Shadow of the Erdtree

image.alt: ELDEN RING: Shadow of the Erdtree

description.about: Players can expect a plethora of new content, including diverse areas to explore, formidable bosses to conquer, and an array of weapons and armor to discover. The introduction of new combat techniques, such as martial arts, adds depth to the already robust combat system. The expansion maintains the series' signature difficulty, providing a rewarding experience for those seeking rigorous challenges.

title: TEKKEN 8

description.about: Tekken 8 boasts a diverse roster of 35 fighters, including returning favorites and new characters, each with unique abilities and fighting styles. The game also offers various modes catering to both solo and multiplayer experiences, with a notable focus on accessibility through simplified controls and features designed to welcome newcomers.

publisher: Bandai Namco Studios, Arika, Bandai Namco Entertainment

recommended_req.graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 2070/AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT

title: UNCHARTED: Legacy of Thieves Collection

description.about:
Play as Nathan Drake and Chloe Frazer in their own standalone adventures as they confront their pasts and forge their own legacies. This game includes the critically acclaimed single-player stories from both UNCHARTED 4: A Thief’s End and UNCHARTED: The Lost Legacy.
 Uncharted: The Lost Legacy shifts focus to Chloe Frazer, a fan-favorite character from previous entries, who partners with mercenary Nadine Ross. Set in the Western Ghats of India, their mission is to recover the legendary Tusk of Ganesh. The game maintains the series' signature blend of action, exploration, and storytelling, while introducing new dynamics between its protagonists.

publisher: Naughty Dog LLC, Iron Galaxy Studios, PlayStation PC LLC

title: God of War

description.about: The narrative follows Kratos, the former Greek God of War, who now resides in the Norse wilderness with his young son, Atreus. Following the death of Kratos' second wife and Atreus' mother, they embark on a profound journey to fulfill her final wish: to scatter her ashes atop the highest peak in the nine realms. This quest evolves into a path of personal discovery, as Kratos grapples with his tumultuous past and strives to teach his son the virtues of restraint and responsibility.

publisher: Santa Monica Studio, PlayStation PC LLC

title: Marvel’s Spider-Man: Miles Morales

description.about: Miles Morales introduces several unique features that distinguish it from its predecessor, enhancing both gameplay and narrative depth. A standout addition is Miles' Venom abilities, which are bio-electric powers that add a new layer to combat dynamics. These abilities enable players to execute powerful attacks, such as the Venom Punch, which can incapacitate enemies and bypass certain defenses, introducing strategic variety to engagements. Additionally, Miles possesses a camouflage ability, allowing for temporary invisibility. This feature facilitates stealth approaches, enabling players to evade detection or orchestrate silent takedowns, thereby broadening tactical options during missions. The game's setting during the Christmas season in a snow-covered New York City provides a vibrant and festive backdrop, enhancing the visual appeal and atmosphere. This seasonal setting not only enriches the aesthetic experience but also influences mission design and environmental interactions, offering a fresh perspective on the iconic city.

publisher: Insomniac Games, Nixxes Software, PlayStation PC LLC

description.about: Gameplay combines swordplay, magic, and strategic use of alchemy, allowing players to engage in dynamic combat against a variety of foes. The game also features a complex dialogue system, enabling interactions that can alter the course of events. Beyond the main storyline, players can explore numerous side quests, including monster contracts and treasure hunts, enhancing the depth and replayability of the experience.
